title: Serif from opening credits of a 1940’s Batman film
author: sanderpe

comments.content: Close to [Corvinus Skyline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020212919/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/corvinus+skyline) and particularly [Skyline FB](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020212919/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/skyline). /K leg is off though so may be this one is simply the original Corvinus Skyline.
